author: ynwa_m3s
title: Exceptional staff has us looking forward to our visit
text: We have yet to stay, but the help I received on the phone from Brandi and Arsalan while searching for hotels made this an easy choice. They patiently and competently answered all my questions, and I had many since this will be our first visit to Manhattan. They even helped with information not directly related to the hotel. We are so excited (and less perplexed now) about our upcoming trip next week! Great staff is just as important as great amenities.
